Regarding family FPD-142 (which includes patient FPD-142-1):

*   Analysis of DNA from relatives in the FPD-142 kindred showed that all affected members (n=3), but not the unaffected individual, carried the VPS35 D620N mutation, indicating the mutation segregated with the disease in this family.
*   Haplotype analysis was performed on all available family members of the FPD-142 kindred.
*   This haplotype analysis showed that the FPD-142 family shared a common haplotype across 21.2 Mb with another unrelated French family (FPD-858).
